title: Home
content: Home The Department of Libraries, Information and Open Science (DiBISO) and its missions The Department of Libraries, Information and Open Science (DiBISO) and its missions Within Université Paris-Saclay, the libraries' main mission is to implement the documentary policy of the University, CentraleSupélec and ENS Paris-Saclay. The libraries contribute to the institutions' education and research activities. As such, they welcome all university visitors, support the learning and dissemination of scientific and technical information and help implement the open science policy deployed by the University, CentraleSupélec and ENS Paris-Saclay. The Department of Libraries, Information and Open Science coordinates the entire library network to support teaching on the undergraduate programme and teaching and research organised through the graduate schools with all Université Paris-Saclay departments and documentation centres.
